New Records: India has won all seven completed T20Is against Ireland so far
Rishabh Pant is set to make his comeback for India after a car accident less than two years ago
Key Match Events: The match is a high-stakes game with potential for new records
Challenging pitch conditions add to the match's significance
Pre-Game Insights: Ireland's left-arm quicks like Josh Little will aim to exploit India's top order
India's focus is on discipline and their key batters Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, and Suryakumar Yadav
Ireland's middle order and spinners are potential threats
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kohli averages 81.5 in T20 World Cups with 14 of his 25 innings into 50-plus scores
Bumrah has taken six wickets in 12 overs against Ireland at an average of 9.66 and economy rate of 4.83
Quotes from coaches highlight the importance of the match and the buzz it could generate
